item.title: Using batch parameter modifiers to get specific portions or file info from a full filename
item.description: From Using batch parameters [microsoft.com]: Cmd.exe provides the batch parameter expansion variables %0 through %9. When you use batch parameters in a batch file, %0 is replaced by the batch file name, and %1 through %9 are replaced by the corresponding arguments that you type at the command line These batch parameter modifiers variable arguments are immensely useful. That document is missing some examples, so I’ve put together a simple table: %1
